ValidationRule.description: Block users from manually creating Initial BE Setup cases. RO-1761
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "OnboardingCase", ISNEW(), NOT(Created_by_Automation__c), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Customer Operations Manager", $Profile.Name <> "Head of Customer Operations" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This case can never be created manually, but automatically by closing a sales opportunity.
